RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer Class

In this Article

Represents the data contained in a RibbonMenuItem.

Syntax

Declaration

public class RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer : System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IToggleProvider, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider

Constructors

  • RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer(Object,ItemsControlAutomationPeer)

    Initializes a new instance of the RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer class.

    public RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer (object item, System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer itemsControlPeer);

    Parameters

    • item
      Object

      The element associated with this automation peer.

    • itemsControlPeer
      ItemsControlAutomationPeer

      The automation peer that is associated with the ItemsControl that holds the RibbonMenuItem.

Methods

  • GetAutomationControlTypeCore()

    Gets the control type for the RibbonMenuItem that is associated with this RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*.

    protected override System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType GetAutomationControlTypeCore ();

    Returns

    • AutomationControlType

      The AutomationControlType enumeration value.

  • GetClassNameCore()

    Gets the class name of the RibbonMenuItem that is associated with this RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*.

    protected override string GetClassNameCore ();

    Returns

    • String

      The class name of the RibbonMenuItem that is associated with this RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer.

  • GetPattern(PatternInterface)

    Gets the control pattern for the RibbonTab that is associated with the RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer.

    public override object GetPattern (System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface patternInterface);

    Parameters

    • patternInterface
      PatternInterface

      A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.

    Returns

    • Object

      An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, null.

    Remarks

    If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns an object that supports the specified control pattern.

    • patternInterface equals PatternInterface and the RibbonMenuItem that is associated with this RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer has child objects.

    • patternInterface equals PatternInterface and the RibbonMenuItem that is associated with this RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer does not have child objects.

    • patternInterface equals PatternInterface and the RibbonMenuItem that is associated with this RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer has its checkable property set to true.

    • patternInterface equals PatternInterface and the RibbonMenuItem that is associated with this RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer can be resized.

Explicit Interface Implementations

  • IExpandCollapseProvider.Collapse()

    Hides all items that are in the RibbonMenuItem that is associated with this RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer.

    void IExpandCollapseProvider.Collapse ();

    Exceptions

    • ElementNotEnabledException

      The RibbonMenuItem is not enabled.

    • ElementNotAvailableException

      The RibbonMenuItem is virtualized.

    • InvalidOperationException

      The RibbonMenuItem does not contain any items.

      -or-

      The RibbonMenuItem is not available.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IExpandCollapseProvider interface.
